post.body: Its needs more refining but this clearly is the wave of the future.

`You are running out of your allowed space, please contact the site's admin at someone to raise your limit.`

Looks like my uploading days on ZeroTorrent are finallly coming to an end. :( But on the positive side I've been able to tweak my scripts for optimal harvesting and uploading, dead torrents are excluded as are duplicates, and as for the descriptions I dont think we'll be able to squeeze as much in as on clearnet sites, the space just isn't there, the bare minimum will have to suffice.

comment.body: Once this thing starts blowing up we're all going to need bigger hard drives haha
You should also add them to ZeroTorrent too, until a more stable index zite is up and running.
Thats just it, the site cant be taken down as long as there's at least one seed. <3

Yeah, just mentioned that on your recent post. Most people are only after movie, tv and games torrents, forcing them to download everything else would be insane. Not sure if the KAT guy is aware of all this, he hasn't posted in a while.....
Bless you, these are awesome. Now all we need is a Zeronet Development for Dummies book, haha

Yeah, there really needs to be some by-the-numbers tutorials made for Zeronet development, preferably on YouTube, first something basic like Build Your First Zite and then eventually delve into the specifics, working with hubs, SQL and the like.

Its essential for Zeronet's growth, right now so many of us who are used to clearnet development want to start building stuff but don't know where to begin exactly, there's a lot of creative energy and no clear way to channel it, damn shame.
Get good and help us build the ultimate torrent indexer, Alek! :D
A torrent swarm that never ends.
